column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: Initial reports say a British male suddenly died on the corner of 19/178 in Daun Penh between 8.30/9 pm on Wednesday 27
column6: was seen pacing around the area before he collapsed and died. His belongings were sent to sent to police for storage.------A police investigation concluded that the victim suffered from high blood pressure and suffered a heart attack.------The body was placed at Teuk Thla pagoda to wait for relatives.  Updates to follow.
